dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Step-up Type Substation; System Stations; Customer Substation; Distribution Type Substation; Step-down Type Substation; Underground Distribution Substation; Switchyard; 11kv Substation; 220 kV Substation; 132 kV Substation

Step-up Type Substation; System Stations; Customer Substation; Distribution Type Substation; Step-down Type Substation; Underground Distribution Substation; Switchyard; 11kv Substation; 220 kV Substation; 132 kV Substation
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: A transformer substation is a part of an electrical generation, transmission, and distribution system. Transformers within the substation change the voltage levels between high transmission voltages and lower distribution voltages. The transformer essentially 'steps up' or 'steps down' the voltage levels. The substation is constructed with a structure of thin laminated sheets of ferrous metal, most commonly silicon steel, that the primary and secondary windings of the transformer are wrapped around. Most substation transformers rely on an electrical grade insulating liquid to cool the copper windings and core.
变电站是发电、输电和配电系统的一部分。变电站内的变压器可改变高输电电压和低配电电压之间的电压水平。变压器实质上是 "升压 "或 "降压"。变电站由铁质金属薄片（最常见的是硅钢片）构成，变压器的初级和次级绕组就缠绕在这些薄片上。大多数变电站变压器依靠电气级绝缘液体来冷却铜绕组和铁芯。
dataSetInformation.sumFormula: Secondary voltage ÷ Primary voltage = Number of turns in secondary ÷ Number of turns in primary
